Can I count on you?\""},{"lineNumber":66076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいすぐに！　ランス様の功績、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, immediately! We'll broadcast Lord Rance's achievements,"},{"lineNumber":66077,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ばばーんと流しちゃいますとも！」","translatedEnglishLine":"with a big bang!\""},{"lineNumber":66078,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの魔人は単独行動が多いですから。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That demon often acts alone."},{"lineNumber":66079,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もし誤報でも、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if it's false information,"},{"lineNumber":66080,"originalJapaneseLine":"　確かめるのには多少時間が掛かります」","translatedEnglishLine":"it will still take some time to verify it.\""},{"lineNumber":66081,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あとは証拠になるようなモノを","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If only we could present something as evidence,"},{"lineNumber":66082,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見せられれば、言うこと無いんですけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"it would be perfect, but...\""},{"lineNumber":66083,"originalJapaneseLine":"（足音…………？　誰か、ここに……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Footsteps...? Is someone here...?)"},{"lineNumber":66084,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ッ、戦車の出番ね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-The tank's time to shine!\""},{"lineNumber":66085,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、マリア！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"M-Maria!?\""},{"lineNumber":66086,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みんな、もう帰ってきたの！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone's already back!?\""},{"lineNumber":66087,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私だけ先に戻って来ちゃった。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was the only one who came back early."},{"lineNumber":66088,"originalJapaneseLine":"　チューリップ3号の！　出番よね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's Tulip No.3's turn, right!\""},{"lineNumber":66089,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........................\""},{"lineNumber":66090,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それはもちろん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course.\""},{"lineNumber":66091,"originalJapaneseLine":"――――魔人パイアール撃破。そして、離反。","translatedEnglishLine":"--- Demon Lord Paiarl defeated. Then, defection."},{"lineNumber":66092,"originalJapaneseLine":"自由都市の二人目の魔人が脱落した報は、","translatedEnglishLine":"The news that the second demon lord of the Free City had dropped out,"},{"lineNumber":66093,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍を無形の刃となって貫いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"pierced through the demon army like an intangible blade."},{"lineNumber":66094,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあああぁぁ！？　パイアールが！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haaahh!? Paiarl!?\""},{"lineNumber":66095,"originalJapaneseLine":"　馬鹿を言え、ただの流言だろうが！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't be ridiculous, that’s just a rumor!!\""},{"lineNumber":66096,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、いえ、そ、そう……かもしれないのですが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-No, that might be... true, but,"},{"lineNumber":66097,"originalJapaneseLine":"　レイ様のこともあり、兵たちもまさか、と……」","translatedEnglishLine":"considering Lord Rei as well, the soldiers just can't believe it...\""},{"lineNumber":66098,"originalJapaneseLine":"「敵軍のいつもの手だろうが！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is the enemy's usual tactic!"},{"lineNumber":66099,"originalJapaneseLine":"　つまらん情報工作で小細工！　信じるに足りんわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just boring information warfare and tricks! Not enough to believe.\""},{"lineNumber":66100,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そう……ですよね！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yeah... that's right!\""},{"lineNumber":66101,"originalJapaneseLine":"　では全軍にそう伝えます！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then I’ll inform the entire army!\""},

{"lineNumber":66102,"originalJapaneseLine":"「当たり前だ。そんな事になってみろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Obviously. If that really happened,"},

{"lineNumber":66103,"originalJapaneseLine":"　…………あるわけがない。あるわけが……","translatedEnglishLine":"...there’s no way. There’s no way...\""},

{"lineNumber":66104,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし――――","translatedEnglishLine":"However――――"},

{"lineNumber":66105,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃっ、ぎゃあああああぁぁっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gyaaah, gyahhhhh!\""},{"lineNumber":66106,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ、ひいいいいいいい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-Hiiiiii!\""},{"lineNumber":66107,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふ、ふ、ふふふ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"F-f-fufufu...\""},{"lineNumber":66108,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、おい！　打ち落とせよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-Hey! Shoot it down!"},{"lineNumber":66109,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔法使え！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Use magic!\""},{"lineNumber":66110,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばっ、ばか！　無茶を……うぎゃああああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-You idiot! That’s reckless... Ughyaaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":66111,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふふふふふふ…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fufufufufufu...!\""},{"lineNumber":66112,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ……く、くそおおおおぉぉ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guh... d-damn it!\""},{"lineNumber":66113,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ど、どうしようもない……！　おのれえええ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s nothing we can do... Damn you!\""},{"lineNumber":66114,"originalJapaneseLine":"チューリップ3号が、突撃する。","translatedEnglishLine":"Tulip No.3 charges forward."},{"lineNumber":66115,"originalJapaneseLine":"無人の野を行くが如く、","translatedEnglishLine":"As if walking through an uninhabited field,"},{"lineNumber":66116,"originalJapaneseLine":"容易に阻める魔物は存在しない。","translatedEnglishLine":"there are no monsters that can easily block it."},{"lineNumber":66117,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぬ、ぬううううううう！　あ、あの鉄の車……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nn, nuuuuuu! That iron vehicle...!"},{"lineNumber":66118,"originalJapaneseLine":"　パイアール様の兵器はどうした！　来ないのか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Where is Lord Paiarl's weapon? Isn’t it coming?\""},{"lineNumber":66119,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい、影も形もありません！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes, there’s not even a trace of it!\""},{"lineNumber":66120,"originalJapaneseLine":"　や、やっぱり、あ、あの噂……","translatedEnglishLine":"I-It really is, th-that rumor...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ、それは……それでいいのか？
もう少し慎重に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shouldn't we be a little more careful...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいえ。ここはカウンターアタック。
多少賭けだとしても、迅速にかかる場面です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if it's somewhat of a gamble, this is the moment to act swiftly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……承知した。頼めるか？」
「はいすぐに！　ランス様の功績、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, immediately! We'll broadcast Lord Rance's achievements,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばばーんと流しちゃいますとも！」
「あの魔人は単独行動が多いですから。
もし誤報でも、
確かめるのには多少時間が掛かります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it will still take some time to verify it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あとは証拠になるようなモノを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If only we could present something as evidence,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見せられれば、言うこと無いんですけど……」
（足音…………？　誰か、ここに……）
「ッ、戦車の出番ね！」
「ま、マリア！？
みんな、もう帰ってきたの！？
「私だけ先に戻って来ちゃった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was the only one who came back early.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チューリップ3号の！　出番よね！」
「それはもちろん」
――――魔人パイアール撃破。そして、離反。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: --- Demon Lord Paiarl defeated. Then, defection.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市の二人目の魔人が脱落した報は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The news that the second demon lord of the Free City had dropped out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍を無形の刃となって貫いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: pierced through the demon army like an intangible blade.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあああぁぁ！？　パイアールが！？
馬鹿を言え、ただの流言だろうが！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't be ridiculous, that’s just a rumor!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、いえ、そ、そう……かもしれないのですが、
レイ様のこともあり、兵たちもまさか、と……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: considering Lord Rei as well, the soldiers just can't believe it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「敵軍のいつもの手だろうが！
つまらん情報工作で小細工！　信じるに足りんわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just boring information warfare and tricks! Not enough to believe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そう……ですよね！
では全軍にそう伝えます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then I’ll inform the entire army!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「当たり前だ。そんな事になってみろ。
…………あるわけがない。あるわけが……
しかし――――
「ぎゃっ、ぎゃあああああぁぁっ！」
「ひっ、ひいいいいいいい！」
「おっ、おい！　打ち落とせよ！
魔法使え！」
「ばっ、ばか！　無茶を……うぎゃああああ！」
「ふふふふふふふ…………！」
「ぐっ……く、くそおおおおぉぉ！
ど、どうしようもない……！　おのれえええ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s nothing we can do... Damn you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チューリップ3号が、突撃する。
無人の野を行くが如く、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if walking through an uninhabited field,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 容易に阻める魔物は存在しない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are no monsters that can easily block it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬ、ぬううううううう！　あ、あの鉄の車……！
パイアール様の兵器はどうした！　来ないのか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where is Lord Paiarl's weapon? Isn’t it coming?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい、影も形もありません！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes, there’s not even a trace of it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: や、やっぱり、あ、あの噂……

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:
